d_gnome_install: sudo pacman -S gnome gnome-extra telepathy shotwell rhythmbox
d_kde_install: sudo pacman -S plasma kde-applications digikam packagekit-qt5
d_xfce_install: sudo pacman -S xfce4 xfce4-goodies gvfs gvfs-{afc,goa,google,gphoto2,mtp,nfs,smb} lightdm-gtk-{greeter,greeter-settings} file-roller galculator evince ffmpegthumbnailer xscreensaver pavucontrol pulseaudio-alsa rhythmbox
d_mate_install: sudo pacman -S mate mate-extra gnome-icon-theme accountsservice gvfs gvfs-{afc,goa,google,gphoto2,mtp,nfs,smb} lightdm-gtk-{greeter,greeter-settings} file-roller ffmpegthumbnailer pulseaudio pulseaudio-alsa libcanberra-{pulse,gstreamer} rhythmbox
d_deepin_install: sudo pacman -S deepin deepin-extra gvfs gvfs-{afc,goa,google,gphoto2,mtp,nfs,smb} lightdm-gtk-{greeter,greeter-settings}
d_cinnamon_install: sudo pacman -S cinnamon gnome-extra gvfs gvfs-{afc,goa,google,gphoto2,mtp,nfs,smb} lightdm-gtk-{greeter,greeter-settings}
d_cinnamon_addons: sudo pacman -S gnome-terminal rhythmbox gedit galculator
